facts.text: I come in every color of the rainbow! People have bred us in hundreds of varieties.
I give birth to live babies instead of laying eggs! They can swim right away.
I'm named after Robert John Lechmere Guppy who discovered me in Trinidad!
I help control mosquitoes by eating their larvae! I'm a tiny superhero.
Male guppies have bigger, fancier tails to impress the lady guppies!

profile.habitat: Freshwater streams in South America and the Caribbean
